name: Hentai Story Cleopatra
description:
Open an ancient scroll. Warm sands, the waters of the Nile, it all belongs to the Queen of Egypt.
.
Ra has started a new day, Cleopatra has to understand what desires, lust and pride are worth. Get to the end of this Hentai Story of Cleopatra.

Press "Ctrl + F" to get an easy win
or you can win by yourself to get a special hardcore achievement.



Hentai Story Cleopatra is a puzzle game in which you must collect all pairs of pictures to reproduce the image.

Enjoy lush pictures, great music, and leisurely gameplay with Cleopatra.
